Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Vulois:::

::It has been days now, and Vulois is tired and hungry.  All of a sudden he 
spots a base(Chivtrons) in the distance::
Vulois: Thundercracker! I've spotted a base!
::He opned up his comm to the base::
Vulois: My name is Vulois. I come in peace.  Could you please let my friend 
and i in? We need shelter.

--part1_9f.13fddeaf.280755b2_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
